extendedInfo.description: The largest and best organized collection of classical music in the world!Play (stream) these marvelous works of classical music through our queuing player, whenever you want, where ever you are.Find the works you want to listen to with the help of our unique classification, developed by expert musicologists. We offer two modes:	1) The Library â where you can select from all the performances of a work in our enormous collection of recordings â organized by composer, category, and composition;	2) Must Know â where you will be guided to appreciate the most important composers and works of classical music through their latest released recordings.        3) Playlists: (Featured and Mine) allows you to listen to featured playlists or to create, and listen to, your own. Up to 4 hour-long playlists are allowed. Subscriber account at Classical Archives is required.Subscribers have unlimited access and can play entire tracks or complete works (even entire operas) with just one click. Non-subscribers will hear one minute clips of each track.Requires "Read Phone State" permission to pause music playback during incoming calls.

reviews.title: Huge Breadth: A Joy!
reviews.comment: I have been a member for 20+ years, going back to MHS, which this organization is an evolution of.  I have 1,000 CD\'s, listen only to .WAV files, and have been listening to classical music since I was 17: I am now 60.   This app has changed my daily music listening experience.  For one week now, I have been listening three hours per day to Haydn masses and other sacred works.  And then another week for 1/2 of his string quartets!  Huge breadth of composition choices of great Western composers including great minor ones such as Henry Purcell.  AND you can choose  the conductor and performers for each composition!  Hopefully, the app in future will add tweaks.  It needs a menu and settings for functions such as \"clear queue.\"  The functions now are more or less intuitive but also hidden.  Nevertheless, this is such a robust app that I am giving it five stars.  There is so much music here, that I\'ll be listening at least for a year, hours per day, to say nothing of repeating works.  Bravo ClassicalArchives!  Kurt Jensen
reviews.author: Kurt Jensen

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Excellent, well-organized collection, and very good audio quality. I gave a previous version three stars because of a problem with gaps between individual tracks, but the issue\'s resolved now.
reviews.author: Ashish Vulimiri

reviews.title: A great start
reviews.comment: I\'ve been anticipating this app for years, and it\'s a good start.  I\'d like to see an album-oriented option as well. Perhaps selecting an album cover would display all its tracks and permit queuing any or all, as can be done with the PC application. Also, it would be nice if composer name searches did not require correct accent marks. (It took me a while to find Bartok.)
reviews.author: David Low

reviews.title: Extraordinary and Unique!!!
reviews.comment: What a unique resource, this comprehensive treasure house of great performances of great works. In addition to the quality and quantity of its content, this app (and the associated website) is uniquely well-organized, an attribute that leverages its value enormously. As a professional conductor and music educator, I am sharing this indispensable resource with colleagues and students so they may avail themselves of this standoutportal into music\'s world of beauty and inspiration. Thank you, Classical Archives, for making the gift of great music so easy to access and enjoy!
reviews.author: David Barg

reviews.title: At last! Fantastic!!
reviews.comment: This app allows to SELECT what work you want to listen to in this gigantic library! (So it\'s not a radio!) Two main modes: In The Library mode, you can select the performance (album) of the work you want to listen to. To do this in The Library, either select The Greats for quick access to the really greatest composers, or you can search by composer name. In the Must Know mode, you are presented with the latest releases of the most important works. Again two methods: by the Must Know composers, or you can search for these \"must know\" works by Period and/or Genre (like Late-/Post-Romantic + Stage/Opera). The app\'s Queuing Player is beautiful to look at and allows you to add many tracks, even complete works, to be played one after the other.    New! Now with playlists management! Cool!
reviews.author: Pierre Schwob

reviews.title: Great app for classical music lovers
reviews.comment: Beautifully designed: simple and yet very comprehensive. The queuing player is a real plus!
reviews.author: Vladimir Volovich

reviews.title: Classical Archives app rocks!
reviews.comment: Download this app if you\'d like to learn about the best classical music, expertly curated!
reviews.author: Harry Levinson

reviews.title: Very good for classic
reviews.comment: Good looking interface and wide collection of tracks.
reviews.author: Anton Chikin

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Great application with lots of great music!
reviews.author: Alexander Osmanov
